notes.text:
hit kog with a pretty standard archfiend build. the number of trances and calvarys doesnt really matter as long as you play to which ever card you favor. with this deck, since there are 3 trances and 2 cavalrys, i made choices like banishing an emperor for emperors effect knowing that i'd be able to add him back to my hand with any of the 3 trances. its similar to playing the escape the dark dimension version, only without out clogging the deck. restart was clutch as it always is, although in most of my duels i didnt even end up using it. usually opening with any monster and at least a needlebug and one archfiend trap (while call is better roar can get the job done if needed) is good enough.

really fun deck, i definitely recommend if youre looking for a fun climb. also beats sylvans.
i played a few geargias, some fishes mostly. specifically 1 rez who beat me, 1 ojama punk who i beat, and an amazing mirror match for my kog rank up... wish i had saved it
